text: Ara iyatima bayahprapta na ha'oya paryanta uttama byabastha chara tomara tara sampattira dhare-kache'o yabe na [1] ebam parimapa o ojana n'yayyabhabe puropuri debe [2]. Amara ka'uke'o tara sadhyera ceye besi bhara arpana kari na. Ara yakhana tomara katha balabe takhana n'yayya balabe, sbajanera samparke hale'o [3] ebam allahake deya angikara purna karabe [4].
